item.title: Nifty Nvim/Vim Techniques That Make My Life Easier -- Series 11
item.description:
This is the 11th post of my post series on nifty Nvim/Vim techniques that will make my editing experience easier.

Click here to check other posts in this series.

item.title: Learning Expect Programming
item.description: In my previous post, I talked about how to automate the server login process with the help of Expect programming language. This post continues my learning process.

item.title: Sublime Text Regular Expression Cheat Sheet
item.description: A cheat sheet about regular expressions used in Sublime Text.

item.title: 博客图床从七牛云存储迁移到腾讯云存储
item.description: 去年建立博客的时候，选择了七牛对象存储来存放博客的图片，最近收到了七牛的邮件，之前一直在用的域名只是一个测试域名，再过一阵就要回收了，到时必须使用自己的域名。大概看了一下，申请自己的域名还要涉及注册和备案，我仅仅是需要存储图片，这样太费周章，所以决定把博客的图片从七牛迁移出来。

item.title: An Introduction to Lookaround Regular Expression in Neovim/Vim
item.description: Today I want to use some regular expressions for searching and replacing in my files. But I found that Nvim/Vim regular expression engine has its own flavor, which is different from the regex engine used by Sublime Text1. I ended up learning some of the basics of Nvim-style regex. In this post, I want to share about how to use lookaround2 in Nvim.
